Articles.Content:
After the new update, my commnet has disappeared

 

Does anyone know how to get it again

More info needed. How disappeared is it? Nothing even in LKO directly above KSC? Can you control probes anyway? Do you have the commnet gui in the upper left in map mode and what happens when you click it (if it's there)? What does your in-game settings say in relation to commnet?

Did you check to make sure CommNet is still enabled? What are your antenna and DSN settings? You'll find both of those in the escape menu > settings > difficulty settings, turning CommNet on/off is under Basic and the signal strengths are in Advanced.

Since you've posted in the modded installs section, I'll take a punt and say you have some mods installed, and that one of them might be related to the CommNet- candidates include (but are not limited to) CommNet Constellation and RemoteTech. Game version updates are a good way to end up with some broken mods, so check you have the most recent versions of all mods.

If you installed the game using Steam it's a good idea to copy the entire KSP directory out of the Steam folders and paste it somewhere else, and then add mods to that copy so that game updates don't break anything. Updating the game when you want to is harder this way, but it takes a while for mod creators to catch up when a new game version gets released so it avoids breaking anything with every game update.
